text_logic_form: The triangle $XYZ$ is an isosceles triangle.
Find the length of the line $YZ$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: The triangle $XYZ$ is an isosceles triangle.
Find the length of the line $YZ$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $XY$ is $2x+3$ units.
The length of the line $YA$ is $4x-1$ units.
The length of the line $XY$ is equal to the length of the line $YA$.
line_instances: There are lines $XY$, $XA$, and $YA$, forming the triangle $XYZ$.
